definition: to be situated/located at (of building)/also written 坐落[zuo4 luo4]
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The company is located in Xinzhou City Economic and Technological Development Zone.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落在忻州市經濟技術開發區內。

sentences.english: Enterprises located in Bengbu City High-tech Development Zone.
sentences.chinese: 企業座落在蚌埠市高新技術開發區內。

sentences.english: On the grounds of the Deer Garden Temple sits the Golden Pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 金閣寺座落在鹿苑寺的庭園裏。

sentences.english: Enterprises located in Bengbu City in the hi-tech zones.
sentences.chinese: 企業座落在蚌埠市高新科技技術開發區內。

sentences.english: It is a small villa with a large garden.
sentences.chinese: 老師的家是個小別墅，座落在一個大花園裏。

sentences.english: The university is located in the eastern suburbs of the city.
sentences.chinese: 這座大學座落在城市的東郊。

sentences.english: Another statue, right at the bottom of the famous Heidelberg Schloss .
sentences.chinese: 另一個雕塑，座落在海德堡有名的城堡下方。

sentences.english: It is located in the south wing of the Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 它座落在長江三角洲的南翼。

sentences.english: The south town of Xixinan, Huizhou district, wins the title " The First Town in Apiculture".
sentences.chinese: “安徽養蜂第一鎮”的西溪南鎮座落在本區。

sentences.english: Before long, though, he reached the Grand Hotel at Thirty-first Street.
sentences.chinese: 沒有多久，他就來到了座落在三十一街的宏大旅館。

sentences.english: Located in Linhai Economic Development Zone, is a combination of industry and trade company.
sentences.chinese: 座落在臨海經濟開發區，是一家工貿結合的公司。

sentences.english: The factory where my father works is in the west of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我父親工作的那家工廠座落在城西。

sentences.english: Carfax Tower is situated at the northwest corner of Carfax, which is regarded as the city centre of Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 卡法克斯塔座落在牛津市中心卡法克斯的西北角。

sentences.english: To the south of the British mainland, there lies an island that time seems to have forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 在英國本島南部座落著一個似乎被時光遺忘的島嶼。

sentences.english: The small, unspoiled village is located deep in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 這個未受破壞的小村莊，座落在深山之中。

sentences.english: The company is located in the industrial zone of Shenzhen City Bagua Ling.
sentences.chinese: 本公司座落在深圳市八卦嶺工業區。

definition: to be situated/to be located (of a building)
to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
mountains on one side and water on the other
to be located at/to be situated in
bordering/adjacent to
to take up space/to occupy (space)
to stand tall/to tower aloft
foothills
northern extremity
southern end or extremity
to be right next to/close neighbor
building complex
scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
neighbor/next-door neighbor/near/next to
to tower/to stand straight (of person's bearing)
